game.name: Darkness Ahead
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Darkness Ahead is an adventure game about a man searching for his little brother. A plateau between mountains holds a dark secret about its past. You have to stay alive and collect everything you need to complete your quest.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Darkness Ahead is an adventure game about a man searching for his little brother. A plateau between mountains holds a dark secret about its past. You have to stay alive and collect everything you need to complete your quest.
